name: Weird Battle Simulator
description:
Looking for the worst battle simulator out there? You came to the right place, the game is filled with bugs and glitches. But we have plenty of unique units that are fun!

Features:
- Plenty of ragdoll and physics!
- Control your units!
- A sandbox mode, where you can play around with all of the units!
- An endless mode, where you'll keep playing until you lose! Beat your own high score!
- More than 100 levels!
- Unique units that are weird but fun!
